vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
ἅγιος [ᾰ], α, ον,
devoted to the gods:
__I in good sense, sacred, holy:
__I.1 of things, especially temples, ἈΦροδίτης ἱρὸν ἅ.[Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἱρο᾽ν Ἡρακλέος ἅ.[Refs 5th c.BC+]; μητρός.. ἐστι πατρὶς ἁγιώτερον[Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἅ., τό, temple, [LXX+NT]Holy of Holies, [NT]
__I.2 of persons, holy, pure, [LXX+5th c.BC+] οἱ ἅ. the Saints, [NT] πνεῦμα ἅ. the Holy Spirit, [NT] adverb ἁγίως καὶ σεμνῶς ἔχειν[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II in bad sense, accursed, execrable, [Refs 8th c.BC+]; rare in Attic dialect (see. above). (Possibly cognate with Sanskrit yajati 'sacrifice'.)

vocabinfos.shortDef: holy (moral quality), consecrated ([ceremonially] acceptable to God); holy person/people = saint(s), holy place = sanctuary
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ holy (moral quality), consecrated ([ceremonially] acceptable to God); holy person/people = saint(s), holy place = sanctuary
separate from common condition and use; dedicated., Lk. 2:23; hallowed; used of things, τὰ ἅγια, the sanctuary; and of persons, saints, e.g., members of the first Christian communities; pure, righteous, ceremonially or morally; holy
vocabinfos._es_Definition: santo apartado del uso y condición comunes, santuario
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1)(形容詞)獻給神或歸聖於神,為神而用的
1a)獻給神的,聖潔的,神聖的
1a1)東西
1a2)人或靈體
1b)聖潔=純潔,完全,於神配得的
2)(實名詞)聖潔的(人或物)
2a)聖潔的
2a1)分別為聖的祭肉(太 7:6)
2a2)聖所(來 9:1)
2b)聖所
2c)聖者
2c1)神
2c2)基督
2d)眾聖者
2d1)天使
2d2)信徒
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1)(形容词)献给神或归圣于神,为神而用的
1a)献给神的,圣洁的,神圣的
1a1)东西
1a2)人或灵体
1b)圣洁=纯洁,完全,于神配得的
2)(实名词)圣洁的(人或物)
2a)圣洁的
2a1)分别为圣的祭肉(太7:6)
2a2)圣所(来9:1)
2b)圣所
2c)圣者
2c1)神
2c2)基督
2d)众圣者
2d1)天使
2d2)信徒

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ holy place = sanctuary
separate from common condition and use; dedicated., Lk. 2:23; hallowed; used of things, τὰ ἅγια, the sanctuary;
